title: Paul Polman - Business, campaigning, younger me nearly a priest. ‘Net Positive: how courageous companies thrive by giving more than they take’ #1 Thinkers50 | LinkedIn

quotes: Is your country on track to halt and reverse biodiversity loss by 2030?
Alarmingly, as of late 2024, only 10% of countries have submitted updated plans, and another 33% have updated their national targets.

Vanguard, JPMorgan Chase, BlackRock, HSBC, BNP Paribas and Rabobank are amongst the US, EU and UK investors that made over $10 billion in income over the past decade by financing companies involved in deforestation.
